content: सम्यच्, सम्यंच् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (समीची|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Going with, accompanying. {@--2@} Right, fit, proper, due. {@--3@} Correct, true, accurate. {@--4@} Pleasant, agreeable; किं च कुलानि कवीनां निसर्गसम्यंचि रंजयतु <ls>R. G.</ls> {@--5@} Same, uniform. {@--6@} All, whole, entire. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} (सम्यक्) {@--1@} With, together with. {@--2@} Well, properly, rightly, correctly, truly; सम्यगियमाह <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 5</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 2.">14.</ls> {@--3@} Duly, suitably, correctly, truly. {@--4@} Honourably. {@--5@} Completely, thoroughly. {@--6@} Distinctly.
